results.description: The Republic of Ireland women's team will try to make it two wins out of two in their Euro 2021 qualifying campaign when they host Ukraine on Tuesday.
results.shortTitle: Republic's women host Ukraine in Euros
results.title: Euro 2021 qualifiers: Republic of Ireland v Ukraine

thumbnail.altText: Vera Pauw is the new manager of the Republic of Ireland women's team

results.description: USA ease to a 3-0 friendly win over Republic of Ireland in the first game of a victory tour after their World Cup triumph.
results.shortTitle: World Cup winners USA defeat Republic
results.title: World Cup winners USA defeat Republic of Ireland

thumbnail.altText: Carli Lloyd celebrates making it 3-0 to the United States in the Rose Bowl friendly

results.description: Arsenal Women sign Bayern Munich midfielder Jill Roord, while defender Louise Quinn agrees a new deal with the Gunners.
results.title: Jill Roord: Arsenal Women sign Bayern Munich and Netherlands midfielder

results.description: High street chemist Boots is to sponsor the home nations and Republic of Ireland women's teams for three years.
results.shortTitle: Boots sponsors home nations and Republic
results.title: Boots to sponsor women's home nations and Republic of Ireland sides

thumbnail.altText: England defender Lucy Bronze playing against Wales in a World Cup qualifier

results.description: Republic of Ireland international Katie McCabe signs a new 'long-term' contract extension with Arsenal Women.
results.shortTitle: McCabe signs new Arsenal Women deal
results.title: Katie McCabe: Arsenal Women forward signs new 'long-term' contract extension

results.description: Louise Quinn scores the only goal as the Republic of Ireland beat Wales in the second of two friendly internationals in Marbella.
results.title: Women's international friendly: Wales 0-1 Republic of Ireland

results.description: Scotland are drawn in the same group as former coach Anna Signeul's Finland in the Women's European Championship qualifiers, while Northern Ireland are in the same group as Wales.
results.title: Women's Euro 2021 qualifiers: Scotland face former coach Anna Signeul's Finland

results.description: Brighton & Hove Albion Women sign Republic of Ireland midfielder Megan Connolly on a deal that runs to the end of the season.
results.title: Megan Connolly: Brighton & Hove Albion Women sign Ireland midfielder

results.description: Birmingham City Women sign former Reading full-back Harriet Scott on a one-year deal.
results.title: Harriet Scott: Birmingham City Women sign ex-Reading full-back

results.description: Republic of Ireland duo Katie McCabe and Louise Quinn sign new contracts with Arsenal Women.
results.shortTitle: Irish duo agree new Arsenal Women deals
results.title: Katie McCabe and Louise Quinn: Republic of Ireland duo sign new Arsenal Women deals

results.description: "Safety concerns" prompted the decision not to play anthems at the women's World Cup qualifier.
results.shortTitle: No flags at NI v Republic after 'threat'
results.title: No flags at NI v Republic women's World Cup qualifier

thumbnail.altText: NI's Kendra McMullan shows her frustration after missing a chance against Republic of Ireland

results.description: Christie Murray scores with a late header as Scotland beat Republic of Ireland in their final warm-up match before the women's Euro 2017 finals.
results.title: Scotland women 1-0 Rep Ireland women

thumbnail.altText: Christie Murray celebrates her late goal at Stark's Park

results.description: The Republic of Ireland women's team reaches agreement with their national association after a threat to strike over poor treatment.
results.title: Republic of Ireland women's team reach agreement over threat to strike

thumbnail.altText: The Republic of Ireland's best-known women's player Stephanie Roche
